class_notes: Prerequisites: LING 210 or any language focused phonetics class such as French phonetics or Spanish phonetics.
course_description:
Students study, read, and write on a topic under the direction or supervision of a faculty
member. Permission of the department and a supervising faculty member is required.
sections: Class Nbr: 3743, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10-10:50a, Instructor: Y. Kim, Status: Open
